p: Results showed that pure Lavandula and Rosmarinus were safer on both cell lines compared to Origanum. In particular, IC 50 values obtained for Lavandula were 0.228 ± 0.004 (% v/ v) and 0.274 ± 0.006 (% v/ v) which are ~10-fold (HaCaT) and ~23-fold higher than those obtained for Origanum ( Table 3).
